name: Echoes of the Future
description:
Push into the future while avoiding dangers in the past.

You control a ship with a quantum drive. You need to get through the event horizon but there is an asteroid belt in the way. Blast into the future and reach through the asteroids. But beware, your past self is still in real space and damage to it will reset the quantum drive, The further into the future you push, the longer your delay will be for dodging dangers.

Use Left and Right Arrow Keys or A and D and let your quantum drive charge enough times to reach the top of the screen.

Created for Gamedev.js Jam 2020
Made using the Phaser Jam Template

Music
Darkling by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3616-darkling
